tool.name: SAGA.sim_cellular_automata.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_LIFE $output_data_LIFE name SAGA.sim_cellular_automata.0 TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE FADECOLOR $FADECOLOR prefer $prefer response $response outputType_LIFE $OutputSection_LIFE.outputType_LIFE transmissionMode_LIFE $OutputSection_LIFE.transmissionMode_LIFE

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_LIFE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Conway's Game of Life - a classical cellular automat.<br/><br/>Reference:<br/>- Eigen, M., Winkler, R. (1985): 'Das Spiel - Naturgesetze steuern den Zufall', Muenchen, 404p.<br/>
